title: Elite Fitness Center
description: A 5,000 sq. ft. high-performance commercial gym setup focusing on high-volume strength training.
challenge: Maximizing space for 200+ active morning members.
solution: Circular flow layout using high-density multi-stations.

title: Mountain View Resort
description: Boutique hotel fitness center with high-end cardio and strength aesthetics.
challenge: Logistics for heavy iron transport to remote valley location.
solution: Dedicated Shakti Logistics fleet and on-site assembly team.
